comments.author: anant@kix.in
comments.creator: anant@kix.in
comments.raw_text: migrateApps() is currently called on startup, and should be moved over to run only once on install time. There are other optimizations to be done as well, such as loading a blank page from myapps.mozillalabs.com (or directly reach into localStorage?). Ian also notes that incoming records should be validated. (See https://github.com/mozilla/openwebapps/pull/150)
comments.text: migrateApps() is currently called on startup, and should be moved over to run only once on install time. There are other optimizations to be done as well, such as loading a blank page from myapps.mozillalabs.com (or directly reach into localStorage?). Ian also notes that incoming records should be validated. (See https://github.com/mozilla/openwebapps/pull/150)
